name: QuiVr Vanguard
description:
QuiVr Vanguard gives you a bite sized fantasy archery experience built from the ground up for VR. A map loved by many of the VR Early Adopters, bow mechanics fine tuned over years of development, and an ever expanding pool of items and enemies make QuiVr Vanguard a fantastic intro to VR or a fun way to kill some time.
Features
  • Best in class bow and arrow physics, battle tested in QuiVr
  • Drop-in/Drop-out multiplayer
  • Global, weekly leaderboards
  • Multiple environment skins
  • Varied subset of enemies found in QuiVr
  • Random item rewards as you play
